Articles.Content:
I developed the "Advanced Generators" mod for KSP it adds much new generators so you can generate Fuel,Monopropelant,Xenon and even Air.

But all generators need very very much E.Charge.

The mod also adds an InatakeAir tank so you can use Jet engines in space.

Have fun!

/Users/nundn/Desktop/2013-11-20_00004 Kopie.jpg

/Users/nundn/Desktop/2013-11-20_00006.jpg
So, how can I actually download this mod? And linking pictures from your desktop folders doesn't mean they will show up here
You need to use Imgur or Photobucket to post pictures. And with no download this thread belongs in AddonDev subforum.
Hmm, where can I find source, license and download?
Parts dont need a source...thats only for plugins. Everything thats was described in OP can be done using 'stock' modules...so doubt theres a plugin...
Moving this here for now, PM me or another moderator when you have gotten your post sorted out and want it moved back to releases.
